basic.description: This course covers data analysis, laboratory computers, atomic and molecular optical spectroscopy, nuclear-magnetic resonance spectroscopy, chromatography and electrophoresis, electrochemistry, and mass spectrometry.
basic.subject: CHM
basic.title: Advanced Analytical Chemistry

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: CHM 3120 and 3120L, each with a grade of "C-" or better, as well as PHY 2048C or PHY 2053C with a grade of "C-" or better. Corequisite: CHM 4410.
